committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to disclaim any right, title, or interest of the United States in certain lands in the State of California and to require the Secretary of the Interior to issue a quitclaim deed to such lands in favor of the Soda Flat Company, the present possessor of such land, or its successor in title to such lands.

summary.text: Disclaims any right, title, or interest of the United States in certain lands in California. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to issue a quitclaim deed to such lands.

titles.title: A bill to disclaim any right, title, or interest of the United States in certain lands in the State of California and to require the Secretary of the Interior to issue a quitclaim deed to such lands in favor of the Soda Flat Company, the present possessor of such land, or its successor in title to such lands.
